textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
Meet J.D. (aka John Dory). J.D. is fast and powerful
 He should be able to get you as far as the open
waters out near Shark Reef.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
The Food Chain:
 You've made it pretty far up the food chain.
 At the top of the food chain sits the Shark King.
 Can you unseat him and claim the throne?
